website_summaries.verdict: A versatile and affordable dog bed with a reversible design that will see your pup through every season.
pros: Reversible construction offers both a plush minky lining that's perfect for snuggling on cold nights and smooth quilted fabric that suits warmer weather
Generous size allows dogs to stretch out or cuddle a companion
cons: Well-made, but if your dog is a chewer, the fabric might not hold up

customer_reviews.title: My little dog loves this bed!
customer_reviews.text: Our little puppy has 5 beds throughout our house and 2 of this particular one. He curls up in it and seems to love the comfort and style. He doesn't even try to chew this bed as much as some of the other ones and for the price I think it is a worthwhile purchase all around. Seems to be made well and it's cute...just like my puppy...although they look nothing alike!!
customer_reviews.author: JerseyGirl1628

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: For my dog it was love at first sight! Eddie loves to hang his chin off the edge or sometimes snuggles his nose right in the corner. The sides are soft which some people complained about but my dog really likes it. I like that it is lightweight as we live in hot weather and I can take it easily to put in the RV when we travel.
customer_reviews.author: VJ

customer_reviews.title: Best bed I've ever purchased!
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy with the first one I purchased that 6 months later I purchased another one. My cat even likes it! I've purchased probably 10 different beds in the last 20 yrs. My dog sheds and this material doesn't really grab on to it. It's sturdy and doesn't loosen its shape after time. I bought the medium. My dog is long bodied and 28 pds. Being reversible is another perk as well!
customer_reviews.author: High expectations shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great bed!
customer_reviews.text: My poodle loves this bed! She spends probably 20 hours in it. I’ve already ordered another one to switch out when I wash this one.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Edmonds

customer_reviews.title: A good option for large cats, too.
customer_reviews.text: We had a cube and bed that spent time inside and (mostly) outside. They finally wore out and this was a replacement for the bed. Because our two cats are both large, the size of the bed is fine for them. It has worked out very well as a cat bed [despite the dog paw printing :) ] and it survived an initial soaking when it was left outside and we got a good rain. Very happy with the price and product quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rob S / Sue S

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, but our dog likes to try and ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, but our dog likes to try and bury his bones in the corner of the bed which caused the stitching in the middle of the bed to rip. I had to sew up the popped switching.
customer_reviews.author: BTS

customer_reviews.title: Dog says,  "Yes!".
customer_reviews.text: Dog loves it! Love the color. Soft and big enough for a cocker. Medium.
customer_reviews.author: Nia

customer_reviews.title: Nooks and crannies for treats. Super cushy
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this bed. She like that there are nooks in the corners to hide bones for later.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Mihara

customer_reviews.title: My boys love them. They are shih tzu
customer_reviews.text: My boys love them. They are shih tzu. They stretch out and love the extra room. Not too much extra but just enough. My boys are picky too, So fine product. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: blackdove53

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves his bed!
customer_reviews.text: Nice bed, fluffy and cozy for my dog :) He moves it from room to room to sleep in. He even puts his food bowl in it.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cute, dog approved.
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and cute. Seems pretty quality and my doggie likes it. Haven't put it through the wash yet, but it seems like it will be able to withstand it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda jones

customer_reviews.title: Looks Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Our 15 year old poodle- bichon mix loves his new bed. He has never shown interest in dog bed before..
customer_reviews.author: Grandpa b

product_meta.title: HappyCare Textiles Diamond Quilted Reversible Bed/Cuddler
product_meta.description: Color:light brownThe Pet bed is reversible with popular quilted diamond pattern, You can use it both sides. One side is double diamond quilted smooth fabric. The other side is warm fabric. You can use it for all season: summer and winter. Machine washable, popular navy color. It is 25*21 inches for Medium size dog/cat.
feature_bullets: Reversible design provides year-round comfort in any type of weather or climate
One side features mink-like polyester that is soft and warm during the winter
Popular size: 25 by 21 inches for medium size Pet
The other side features a smooth, diamond quilted fabric that is cooler during summer
Brown Color perfectly matches a lot of furniture and floor's and gets your dog and cat really comfortable feeling
Raised sides and comfy bolsters create a feeling of safety and a deep sleeping spot for snuggling and nesting. One side is lower to make it easier to step in and out
Rectangular bed is the perfect shape for setting up a private sleeping nook for both cats and dogs in the corner of any room
